_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Hytale - Numdrassl Proxy
author: me@logikoz.net
description: Runs Numdrassl Proxy for Hytale using Java 21. Downloads the proxy jar on install.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
set -eu

cd /mnt/server

if [ -z "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" ]; then
  echo "ERROR: DOWNLOAD_URL is empty."
  exit 1
fi

echo "Downloading Numdrassl proxy jar..."
echo "URL: ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
echo "Output: ${SERVER_JARFILE}"

rm -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}" || true

# GitHub releases may redirect
curl -L --fail --retry 5 --retry-delay 2 -o "${SERVER_JARFILE}" "${DOWNLOAD_URL}"

echo "Download completed."
ls -lah "${SERVER_JARFILE}"

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The jar file name used to start the proxy.

variables.name: Download URL
variables.description: Direct URL to the Numdrassl proxy jar. Used during installation.
